``The Laboratory for Laser Energetics is a scientific research facility that is a part of the University of Rochester; Laser Energetics specializes in the investigation of high-energy physics.''
* Perform clerical duties such as filing, answering phones, draft and edit office memos, and typing correspondence

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Sophia Lu has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 7 years. Currently she is employed as a Data Analyst at Nova Consulting. Sophia has extensive knowledge of SAS Statistical Package, SQL, Oracle PL/SQL, Stored Procedures, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Microsoft Excel, shell scripting, UNIX, Seagate Crystal Reports, SQL Server Reporting Services, SQL Server Integration Services, SAS Web Report Studio, PDF, Oracle, Microsoft Word, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Outlook, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Access, ETL, Adobe Photoshop. So far Sophia has not gained any managerial experience.
